website_summaries.verdict: Whether your kiddo likes to splash in the water or frolic in a ball pit, this versatile pool is sure to provide hours of fun.
pros: This paddling pool doubles as a ball pit
Includes a ball hoop for added fun
Sun shade protects little ones on sunny days
cons: Although setup is easy, taking it down is a fiddly process

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use as a ball pit for my kids. It was very easy to set up. You just open it up and it’ll pop up and all you have to do it clip on the basketball hoop and/or canopy shade. It’s sturdy enough to hold 400 balls. My kids have been jumping in the ball in with no issues. The basketball hoop is a great bonus to keep them entertained for a while.
customer_reviews.author: TC. Hon

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies but not for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Easy and quick to set up and take down. We have used it for a pool and for sun/wind protection. We have two labradors and I would not recommend this product for dogs. I had to patch a hole after the first use from my dog but it still works fine for the baby.
customer_reviews.author: William F.

customer_reviews.title: Good investment for little ones.
customer_reviews.text: The little ones loved this! You do have to buy the balls separate, but theres so enough room for them to feel like they're at Chuck E Cheese. It's great for the backyard. Easy to take down and setup. Very portable. The kiddos enjoy that their balls stay in one area and they don't have to go chasing after them.
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I bought from amazon my son and god daughter loves it! Perfect size for kids ams great for multiple use
customer_reviews.author: Janice Payton

customer_reviews.title: Increase the quality of life, recommended to everyone to choose
customer_reviews.text: My children especially like this. It can be put in the outdoor garden in summer to play with the children, so it is particularly practical and increases the quality of life. It is recommended for everyone to choose
customer_reviews.author: Walter Black

customer_reviews.title: Nephew approved!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pool for my 7 month old nephew and he loves it! I love that he will not be outgrowing it anytime soon so it will get good use out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Kami

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: My lil ones are having a blast in this...we use this as a kids pool..and also attached the little tikes slide...we do not have much of an outdoor space..so I usually give up on sensory bins play for my kids..But I have used this as a spot for all sensory related activities...it's a win win situation where...my kids can enjoy making a mess without so many restrictions on play😋🙈...and I need not worry about the after play mess and cleaning.. The only cons I see...is it would have been nice if there was some sort of padding/cushion inside..
customer_reviews.author: Anusha mupala

customer_reviews.title: Not shady enough.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to pop up, but it also collapsed easily, which made me very nervous as my little one was playing in it. The sun shade also doesn’t shade much. In the Florida heat that is very important.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pool
customer_reviews.text: This was a great kiddie pool for our baby. He enjoyed playing in the pool or just using it as a ball pit. It's great it has a dual use. Folding the pool can be a little challenging but after a few tries I was able to get it folded.
customer_reviews.author: Chevanese H. Vandyke

customer_reviews.title: Our one year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product for our 1 year old daughter to play in. We liked that it can be folded up and put away, used indoors and out, and with water or balls. It packs up small enough to be put in a bag to take to a friend's house. We found that a bag of 400 balls fits perfectly inside. This was exactly what we were looking for. We haven't used it with water or outside yet, but plan to soon.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Good durable pool for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. 1yr old grandson loves playing in and with water. Better to put in shade as covering doesn’t help much. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Good for this summer - doubt it will last longer than that but it just barely meets our needs. Does not stand up well on it's own
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great pool for a toddler holds up and is easy to put away. Love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Florence Keeling

customer_reviews.title: Great to go ball pit
customer_reviews.text: They say you can use it for pool but I’m not sure if that’s a good idea I have a 10 month old who wants to grab to hold the side of things and it just comes right down. But for an easy to go ball pit it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Says can be used as a pool but quality is not durable enough to do so
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality for an item to be used as a pool. Has a hole in it!

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely not worth the money but what's done is done. It's very thin the walls don't stay up all that great and it rips super easily.
customer_reviews.author: Pan

customer_reviews.title: Needs better instructions
customer_reviews.text: Life saver for quick set up but needs better instructions for pack away
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: The grands approve of it! Loads of fun for little ones.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 little grandbabies! They have so much fun indoors and outdoors in this thing. It is very durable & easily assembled. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Yahle

customer_reviews.title: The quality is good and the price is perfect
customer_reviews.text: We are using it as a pool I thought it was going to be small but it’s a perfect size for three kids please my daughter loves it easy to put away and take it anywhere love it
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: We can't wait to use it next summer as a kiddie ball pit pool for our 1 year old and 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Folker

customer_reviews.title: Should cost less
customer_reviews.text: The item is smaller than I expected and the materials are not as good as it looked in the image product

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It is almost impossible to fold this item and place back in carry case

customer_reviews.title: Good size for littles!
customer_reviews.text: Good sized for my little ones. Enough room for my 8 month old and 4 year old to sit in. Ordered balls separately so the kids could play indoors as well and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Berger
